title: {Serve,Client}Codec should document thread-safety requirement
body:
http://golang.org/pkg/net/rpc/#ClientCodec

both ServerCodec and ClientCodec should be thread-safe in that the
ReadXxxxHeader()+ReadXxxxBody() and WriteXxxx() for a given codec will run concurrently.

It makes a lot of sense when you think of it, but it is not explicitly documented.

This is with changeset:   17932:0ff127f41a08.
